author: jackmurray
created_time: December 27, 2022, 01:02:51 PMLast edit: December 27, 2022, 04:21:22 PM by mprep
content: Please, can you help me?I have two projects that I would like to announce.One is a cryptocurrency exchange that supports trading between BTC and XMR.The other is a bitcoin gambling game.I'm not sure if it is appropriate to announce them in this forum.If it is appropriate, which section of the forum should I announce these projects?I found the Project Development section of the forum.I will announce my projects there.Thank you for viewing my beginner question![moderator's note: consecutive posts merged]

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Quote from: jackmurray on December 27, 2022, 01:02:51 PM....One is a cryptocurrency exchange that supports trading between BTC and XMR.Service Discussion - Exchanges https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=223.0QuoteThe other is a bitcoin gambling game.Gambling board https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=56.0Quote from: jackmurray on December 27, 2022, 01:14:41 PMI found the Project Development section of the forum.Those two boards I mentioned above may be more appropriate for your two projects.

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: Another thing is you need to buy copper membership because you're still a newbie and you can't attach image [1] usually people doesn't interested with a plain text announcement, so it's better for you to create/hire someone to design the announcement thread of your project.Project development section is used if your site is still not fully launched or you want to get few participant to test the site, depends on your intention or purpose.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promote

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: You have been given a good suggestions on the two boards that best suits your announcement which is service discussion and gambling discussion, you can as well do yourself more good to kearn further on the required standard to post and what and what is allow and not allowed to post when creating a thread about announcement, also read through the forum's rules and regulations to get used to other guidelines of the forum and avoid spamming.

comments.author: fortunecrypto
comments.body: Quote from: jackmurray on December 27, 2022, 01:02:51 PMPlease, can you help me?I have two projects that I would like to announce.One is a cryptocurrency exchange that supports trading between BTC and XMR.The other is a bitcoin gambling game.I'm not sure if it is appropriate to announce them in this forum.If it is appropriate, which section of the forum should I announce these projects?@Yogee already posted where you can create an announcement on your two projects but before you create announcements you need to check other announcements that are similar to your project so you'll get an idea of how to properly configure or what makes a good announcement, we recommend that you purchase a copper account and hire a good designer to design your announcement, to make it competitive but the most important is always update your announcement to generate leads and interest to visitors.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Quote from: 348Judah on December 27, 2022, 03:06:23 PMYou have been given a good suggestions on the two boards that best suits your announcement which is service discussion and gambling discussionWrongService discussion is to discuss about a site, it doesn't make sense if the @OP is review his own site. The best board to post about announcement thread are either on service announcement or exchange section.Gambling discussion is used to talk about a particular sport or general discussion about gambling, the @OP should post his announcement on gambling board.

comments.author: RapTarX
comments.body: Quote from: Yogee on December 27, 2022, 01:19:46 PMQuote from: jackmurray on December 27, 2022, 01:02:51 PM....One is a cryptocurrency exchange that supports trading between BTC and XMR.Service Discussion - Exchanges https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=223.0The specified board you shared is for discussion about different services and if the discussion is about exchanges, then you should post it there. But when it comes to posting an ANN thread, you must post in the Service Announcement board- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=84.0Quote from: Plaguedeath on December 27, 2022, 03:18:03 PMGambling discussion is used to talk about a particular sport or general discussion about gambling, the @OP should post his announcement on gambling board.though your quoted post says gambling discussion, Yogee suggested him to post in the Gambling section. That was correct of course.

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: Quote from: Solosanz on December 27, 2022, 02:41:58 PMAnother thing is you need to buy copper membership because you're still a newbie and you can't attach image [1] usually people doesn't interested with a plain text announcement, so it's better for you to create/hire someone to design the announcement thread of your project.Although he don't need to buy copper membership as he already have received 7 merits and will get the required activity in next two distribution period or say roughly in a month if he remains active for the period.But yes as he into promoting a business here then buying a copper membership will help to gain a little more trust among members and have well designed ANN thread for his announcement.You have been already suggested the specified board for your projects and gambling related discussion goes into gambling board only so you must have your thread there and see if you can have some users for it but rank up to junior member or buy membership if you want to post images.
